borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <div>The proposed outbuilding by reason of creating a self contained residential unit, is not considered ancillary to the dwelling house, therefore harmful to the character of the area. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div>- Policies 7.1, 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (March 2016);</div><div>- Policy D4 of the Draft London Plan Intended to Publish (December 2019);</div><div>-&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 11pt;">Policies&nbsp;SP 2, DMD 1 and&nbsp;DMD 6&nbsp;of&nbsp;the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19)</span></div><div>- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</div>

<div>The proposed outbuilding by reason of creating a self contained residential unit would result&nbsp;in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of daylight and privacy to neighbouring properties, with increased noise and general disturbance. Therefore constituting an unneighbourly development and contrary to:</div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div>- Policies 7.1, 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (March 2016);</div><div>- Policy D4 of the Draft London Plan Intended to Publish (December 2019);</div><div>-&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 11pt;">Policy DMD 1 and DMD 6&nbsp;of&nbsp;the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19)</span></div><div>- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);</div><div><br></div>
description: Demolition of existing outbuilding and construction of ancillary granny annex.
